sight."},{"lineNumber":236071,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そして、いつしか攻めていた筈の","translatedEnglishLine":"And then, the one who was supposed to be assault!"},{"lineNumber":236073,"originalJapaneseLine":"「最後は先を潰した矢で、","translatedEnglishLine":"In the end, with an arrow whose tip was broken off,"},{"lineNumber":236074,"originalJapaneseLine":"　みぞおちを射られて鎌女選手が崩れ落ちました！","translatedEnglishLine":"she was shot in the solar plexus and collapsed!"},{"lineNumber":236075,"originalJapaneseLine":"「一歩も動かんまま、相手を殺さず制するとか、","translatedEnglishLine":"To win without moving an inch and without killing the opponent,"},{"lineNumber":236076,"originalJapaneseLine":"　戦いぶりが綺麗やねー、ホンマ","translatedEnglishLine":"that's a truly elegant way to fight."},{"lineNumber":236077,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これで試合は決着、となったのですが……","translatedEnglishLine":"With that, the match was decided, but..."},{"lineNumber":236078,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この後、予想外の事態に！","translatedEnglishLine":"afterwards, an unexpected situation occurred!"},{"lineNumber":236079,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんと、客席から飛び出した忍者の方々が、","translatedEnglishLine":"Suddenly, ninjas jumped out from the audience,"},{"lineNumber":236080,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ど派手にも崩れ落ちた鎌女選手を","translatedEnglishLine":"trying dramatically to kill the fallen Kamagome!"},{"lineNumber":236081,"originalJapaneseLine":"　殺そうと迫ります！","translatedEnglishLine":"They move in to assassinate her!"},{"lineNumber":236082,"originalJapaneseLine":"「抜け忍は追っ手に殺される、","translatedEnglishLine":"Fugitive ninjas are supposed to be killed by pursuers,"},{"lineNumber":236083,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そういう定めらしいからなあ","translatedEnglishLine":"that's the rule, apparently."},{"lineNumber":236084,"originalJapaneseLine":"「と、ここを救ったのも乱義選手！","translatedEnglishLine":"But it was Rangi who saved the day here!"},{"lineNumber":236085,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これまた先を潰した矢で、","translatedEnglishLine":"Again, with an arrow whose tip was broken off,"},{"lineNumber":236086,"originalJapaneseLine":"　忍者の方々を一斉にズドン！","translatedEnglishLine":"he simultaneously shoots down the ninja attackers!"},{"lineNumber":236087,"originalJapaneseLine":"　一瞬で制圧してしまいました","translatedEnglishLine":"He instantly subdued them."},{"lineNumber":236088,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そして、鎌女選手の肩を抱き、","translatedEnglishLine":"Then, he put his arm around Kamagome's shoulder,"},{"lineNumber":236089,"originalJapaneseLine":"　彼女は私がもらい受けると宣言！","translatedEnglishLine":"declaring he would take her as his partner!"},{"lineNumber":236090,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひゃー、やるやんか！","translatedEnglishLine":"Wow, impressive!"},{"lineNumber":236091,"originalJapaneseLine":"「色々と立場的にややこしいのか、","translatedEnglishLine":"Because of complicated circumstances,"},{"lineNumber":236092,"originalJapaneseLine":"　忍者の方々はこれを受けて去って行きました","translatedEnglishLine":"the ninjas accepted this and left."},{"lineNumber":236093,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これにて二人の試合は本当に決着や","translatedEnglishLine":"That truly settled the match between the two."},{"lineNumber":236094,"originalJapaneseLine":"「鎌女選手のパートナー役は自分自身です」","translatedEnglishLine":"Kamagome's partner role is himself."},{"lineNumber":236095,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その後の控え室での鎌女選手の","translatedEnglishLine":"At the dressing room afterward, Kamagome's"},{"lineNumber":236096,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あの表情を皆さんにお見せできないのが","translatedEnglishLine":"expression is something I can't show to everyone,"},{"lineNumber":236097,"originalJapaneseLine":"　少し残念です","translatedEnglishLine":"which is a bit regrettable."},{"lineNumber":236098,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほほう、どんなやってん","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh? What was it like?"},{"lineNumber":236099,"originalJapaneseLine":"「瞳はうるうる潤ませて、ポーッと頬は赤く……","translatedEnglishLine":"Her eyes were moist and shining, cheeks flushed..."},{"lineNumber":236100,"originalJapaneseLine":"　視線は絶えず乱義さんだけを見つめて……","translatedEnglishLine":"her gaze fixed solely on Rangi-san..."},{"lineNumber":236101,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あっ、駄目、これ以上私の口からは言えません！","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, no, I can’t say any more than this!"},{"lineNumber":236102,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私はそこで退室したので、","translatedEnglishLine":"I left the room there,"},{"lineNumber":236103,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どうなったか分かりませんが……","translatedEnglishLine":"so I don't know what happened after that..."},{"lineNumber":236104,"originalJapaneseLine":"　はあ、なんかもう羨ましいです","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, I'm just jealous already."},{"lineNumber":236105,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あんまり長々と説明してると","translatedEnglishLine":"If I keep explaining this for too long,"},{"lineNumber":236106,"originalJapaneseLine":"　本当に切なくなっちゃうので、","translatedEnglishLine":"it really gets me down,"},{"lineNumber":236107,"originalJapaneseLine":"　次行きましょ、次","translatedEnglishLine":"let’s move on, next."},{"lineNumber":236108,"originalJapaneseLine":"「Ｃブロック一戦目、","translatedEnglishLine":"The first match of block C,"},{"lineNumber":236109,"originalJapaneseLine":"　アレキサンダーＶＳヒーロー・ヘルマン","translatedEnglishLine":"Alexander versus Hero Hermann."},{"lineNumber":236110,"originalJapaneseLine":"「巨体同士の戦いとなりました、","translatedEnglishLine":"It was a battle between two giants,"},{"lineNumber":236111,"originalJapaneseLine":"　世界最強の格闘王アレキサンダー選手と、","translatedEnglishLine":"the world’s strongest fighting king Alexander and"},{"lineNumber":236112,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ドラゴンであるヒーロー選手の一戦","translatedEnglishLine":"the dragon, Hero."},{"lineNumber":236113,"originalJapaneseLine":"「試合開始早々に怒濤の猛攻撃を行うヒーロー選手。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hero launched a furious assault right at the start of the match."},{"lineNumber":236114,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そのパワーは凄まじく一撃食らうだけで、","translatedEnglishLine":"His power was so immense that just one hit,"},{"lineNumber":236115,"originalJapaneseLine":"　致命的なのが見てるだけで伝わるほどでした","translatedEnglishLine":"it was clear just by watching that it could be fatal."},{"lineNumber":236116,"originalJapaneseLine":"「が、しかしや……","translatedEnglishLine":"However..."},{"lineNumber":236117,"originalJapaneseLine":"「巨体とは思えぬ、素早さ、細やかさで","translatedEnglishLine":"With speed and subtlety that no one would expect from his giant frame,"},{"lineNumber":236118,"originalJapaneseLine":"　攻撃を受け、いなし、避けるアレキサンダー選手。","translatedEnglishLine":"Alexander took and deflected attacks, dodging them."},{"lineNumber":236119,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まったくダメージが入りません","translatedEnglishLine":"He took absolutely no damage."},{"lineNumber":236120,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まるで子供と大人が相撲取ってるようやったね。","translatedEnglishLine":"It was like a child wrestling an adult."},{"lineNumber":236121,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ヒーローも決して弱くないんやけど","translatedEnglishLine":"Hero is by no means weak, though."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鎖鎌を飛ばします！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He throws the chain sickle!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかしこれを乱義選手、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But Rangi-san,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 慌てることなく弓矢で撃ち落とします！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: calmly shoots it down with his bow and arrow!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「鎌女選手も果敢に攻め続けますが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kamagome continues to attack boldly, but

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怒濤の攻撃も全て撃ち落とされます！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: all her furious attacks are shot down!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まるで乱義選手の周りに結界があるかの如く！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As if a barrier surrounds Rangi!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その場から一歩も動かん乱義から、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rangi doesn’t move an inch from his spot,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バシュンバシュンと矢が飛んでいく光景は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and arrows fly swiftly from him,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中々すごいもんがあったで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it was quite a remarkable sight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして、いつしか攻めていた筈の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And then, the one who was supposed to be attacking,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鎌女選手が弓矢の猛攻に防戦一方に！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kamagome, suddenly falls into a defensive stance under the fierce arrow assault!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「最後は先を潰した矢で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the end, with an arrow whose tip was broken off,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みぞおちを射られて鎌女選手が崩れ落ちました！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she was shot in the solar plexus and collapsed!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「一歩も動かんまま、相手を殺さず制するとか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To win without moving an inch and without killing the opponent,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いぶりが綺麗やねー、ホンマ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that's a truly elegant way to fight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これで試合は決着、となったのですが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With that, the match was decided, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この後、予想外の事態に！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: afterwards, an unexpected situation occurred!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんと、客席から飛び出した忍者の方々が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, ninjas jumped out from the audience,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ど派手にも崩れ落ちた鎌女選手を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: trying dramatically to kill the fallen Kamagome!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 殺そうと迫ります！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They move in to assassinate her!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「抜け忍は追っ手に殺される、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fugitive ninjas are supposed to be killed by pursuers,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういう定めらしいからなあ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that's the rule, apparently.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「と、ここを救ったのも乱義選手！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But it was Rangi who saved the day here!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これまた先を潰した矢で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Again, with an arrow whose tip was broken off,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 忍者の方々を一斉にズドン！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he simultaneously shoots down the ninja attackers!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一瞬で制圧してしまいました
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He instantly subdued them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして、鎌女選手の肩を抱き、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, he put his arm around Kamagome's shoulder,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼女は私がもらい受けると宣言！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: declaring he would take her as his partner!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひゃー、やるやんか！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wow, impressive!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「色々と立場的にややこしいのか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because of complicated circumstances,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 忍者の方々はこれを受けて去って行きました
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the ninjas accepted this and left.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これにて二人の試合は本当に決着や
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That truly settled the match between the two.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「鎌女選手のパートナー役は自分自身です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kamagome's partner role is himself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その後の控え室での鎌女選手の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the dressing room afterward, Kamagome's

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの表情を皆さんにお見せできないのが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: expression is something I can't show to everyone,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し残念です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: which is a bit regrettable.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほほう、どんなやってん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh? What was it like?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「瞳はうるうる潤ませて、ポーッと頬は赤く……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Her eyes were moist and shining, cheeks flushed...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 視線は絶えず乱義さんだけを見つめて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: her gaze fixed solely on Rangi-san...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、駄目、これ以上私の口からは言えません！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, no, I can’t say any more than this!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私はそこで退室したので、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I left the room there,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうなったか分かりませんが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so I don't know what happened after that...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はあ、なんかもう羨ましいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, I'm just jealous already.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あんまり長々と説明してると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If I keep explaining this for too long,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当に切なくなっちゃうので、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it really gets me down,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次行きましょ、次
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: let’s move on, next.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「Ｃブロック一戦目、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The first match of block C,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレキサンダーＶＳヒーロー・ヘルマン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alexander versus Hero Hermann.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「巨体同士の戦いとなりました、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was a battle between two giants,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界最強の格闘王アレキサンダー選手と、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the world’s strongest fighting king Alexander and

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ドラゴンであるヒーロー選手の一戦
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the dragon, Hero.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「試合開始早々に怒濤の猛攻撃を行うヒーロー選手。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hero launched a furious assault right at the start of the match.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのパワーは凄まじく一撃食らうだけで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His power was so immense that just one hit,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 致命的なのが見てるだけで伝わるほどでした
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it was clear just by watching that it could be fatal.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「が、しかしや……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「巨体とは思えぬ、素早さ、細やかさで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With speed and subtlety that no one would expect from his giant frame,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 攻撃を受け、いなし、避けるアレキサンダー選手。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alexander took and deflected attacks, dodging them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まったくダメージが入りません
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He took absolutely no damage.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まるで子供と大人が相撲取ってるようやったね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was like a child wrestling an adult.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヒーローも決して弱くないんやけど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hero is by no means weak, though.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鎖鎌を飛ばします！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He throws the chain sickle!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかしこれを乱義選手、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But Rangi-san,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 慌てることなく弓矢で撃ち落とします！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: calmly shoots it down with his bow and arrow!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「鎌女選手も果敢に攻め続けますが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kamagome continues to attack boldly, but

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怒濤の攻撃も全て撃ち落とされます！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: all her furious attacks are shot down!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まるで乱義選手の周りに結界があるかの如く！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As if a barrier surrounds Rangi!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その場から一歩も動かん乱義から、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rangi doesn’t move an inch from his spot,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バシュンバシュンと矢が飛んでいく光景は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and arrows fly swiftly from him,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中々すごいもんがあったで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it was quite a remarkable sight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして、いつしか攻めていた筈の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And then, the one who was supposed to be attacking,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鎌女選手が弓矢の猛攻に防戦一方に！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kamagome, suddenly falls into a defensive stance under the fierce arrow assault!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「最後は先を潰した矢で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the end, with an arrow whose tip was broken off,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みぞおちを射られて鎌女選手が崩れ落ちました！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she was shot in the solar plexus and collapsed!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「一歩も動かんまま、相手を殺さず制するとか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To win without moving an inch and without killing the opponent,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いぶりが綺麗やねー、ホンマ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that's a truly elegant way to fight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これで試合は決着、となったのですが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With that, the match was decided, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この後、予想外の事態に！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: afterwards, an unexpected situation occurred!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんと、客席から飛び出した忍者の方々が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, ninjas jumped out from the audience,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ど派手にも崩れ落ちた鎌女選手を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: trying dramatically to kill the fallen Kamagome!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 殺そうと迫ります！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They move in to assassinate her!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「抜け忍は追っ手に殺される、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fugitive ninjas are supposed to be killed by pursuers,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういう定めらしいからなあ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that's the rule, apparently.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「と、ここを救ったのも乱義選手！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But it was Rangi who saved the day here!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これまた先を潰した矢で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Again, with an arrow whose tip was broken off,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 忍者の方々を一斉にズドン！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he simultaneously shoots down the ninja attackers!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一瞬で制圧してしまいました
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He instantly subdued them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして、鎌女選手の肩を抱き、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, he put his arm around Kamagome's shoulder,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼女は私がもらい受けると宣言！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: declaring he would take her as his partner!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひゃー、やるやんか！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wow, impressive!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「色々と立場的にややこしいのか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because of complicated circumstances,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 忍者の方々はこれを受けて去って行きました
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the ninjas accepted this and left.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これにて二人の試合は本当に決着や
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That truly settled the match between the two.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「鎌女選手のパートナー役は自分自身です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kamagome's partner role is himself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その後の控え室での鎌女選手の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the dressing room afterward, Kamagome's

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの表情を皆さんにお見せできないのが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: expression is something I can't show to everyone,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し残念です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: which is a bit regrettable.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほほう、どんなやってん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh? What was it like?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「瞳はうるうる潤ませて、ポーッと頬は赤く……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Her eyes were moist and shining, cheeks flushed...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 視線は絶えず乱義さんだけを見つめて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: her gaze fixed solely on Rangi-san...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、駄目、これ以上私の口からは言えません！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, no, I can’t say any more than this!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私はそこで退室したので、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I left the room there,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうなったか分かりませんが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so I don't know what happened after that...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はあ、なんかもう羨ましいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, I'm just jealous already.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あんまり長々と説明してると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If I keep explaining this for too long,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当に切なくなっちゃうので、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it really gets me down,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次行きましょ、次
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: let’s move on, next.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「Ｃブロック一戦目、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The first match of block C,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレキサンダーＶＳヒーロー・ヘルマン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alexander versus Hero Hermann.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「巨体同士の戦いとなりました、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was a battle between two giants,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界最強の格闘王アレキサンダー選手と、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the world’s strongest fighting king Alexander and

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ドラゴンであるヒーロー選手の一戦
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the dragon, Hero.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「試合開始早々に怒濤の猛攻撃を行うヒーロー選手。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hero launched a furious assault right at the start of the match.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのパワーは凄まじく一撃食らうだけで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His power was so immense that just one hit,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 致命的なのが見てるだけで伝わるほどでした
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it was clear just by watching that it could be fatal.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「が、しかしや……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「巨体とは思えぬ、素早さ、細やかさで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With speed and subtlety that no one would expect from his giant frame,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 攻撃を受け、いなし、避けるアレキサンダー選手。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alexander took and deflected attacks, dodging them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まったくダメージが入りません
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He took absolutely no damage.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まるで子供と大人が相撲取ってるようやったね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was like a child wrestling an adult.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヒーローも決して弱くないんやけど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hero is by no means weak, though.
